content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.peg: A leg short, replaced with peg.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.spi: Spindly frame and a craning neck.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.jit: Jittery limbs that won’t stay still.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.noT: No teeth, or at least none of your own.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.nec: Necrotic leghole that whistles in the wind.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.swo: A spider’s bite left your face a swollen mess.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.bur: One side of your face is badly burnt.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.vei: Veins that bulge and pulse, as if your blood was gruel.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.sca: Scaly skin flakes that get everywhere.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.pic: You pick at your infected gums, especially while talking.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.ano: You cannot help but answer most any question with another question.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.noI: Never really grasped the concept of irony.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.con: Everything is a conspiracy to you.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.clo: You only change clothes when they’ve been worn to threads.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.bed: Cannot get a good night’s sleep without a bedtime story you haven’t heard before.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.eat: The sound of other people chewing is agony to you. You eat alone.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.oth: You like to pop other people’s pustules. Of which there are plenty.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.ant: Cannot stand hypocrites, and you find them everywhere.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.fou: You prefer to run on all fours.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.not: When someone calls you a coward you are obsessively obliged to prove them otherwise.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.thr: Thrives in awkward situations. You know just how to create them.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.sho: Enjoys drinking out of shoes. For the flavor.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.bar: Serial bargainer. Making a deal is more important than making a profit.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.can: You pretend to know how to read. It’s worked out so far.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.hon: You never back down from a fight. A matter of honor or folly?
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.wan: More than anything you want to be famous. Terrified of being forgotten.
content.makedatanotlore.scvmfurther2.tok: You create little tokens and mementos from things you find. Others call them junk, but they're treasures to you.
